key_risks: Regulatory compliance challenges related to anti-money laundering (AML) and data privacy
High sensitivity to changes in interest rates impacting profitability
Cybersecurity threats leading to potential financial losses or reputational harm
Intense competition from regional, national banks, and fintech companies
controversies: Potential fines or reputational damage due to regulatory compliance issues
Exposure to cybersecurity risks despite digital transformation efforts
social_issues: Strong community engagement through sponsorships and charitable contributions
Potential data security concerns impacting customer trust
governance_issues: Recent leadership changes introducing potential execution risks
